Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 2
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.This second cartoon of the set shows Hu Feng with Chiang Kai-shek (Jiang Jieshi) inspecting Guomindang troops; Hu Feng on a visit to Japan (Mt. Fuji is visible though the window); Hu Feng and Guomindang secret agents being sent out by Chiang from the Guomindang General Office; and Hu Feng with Guomindang secret agents preaching the course of Realism.
